TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XDocument extends System.Xml.Linq.XContainer

summary.span: 表示 XML 文档。

span.span: Represents an XML document.

summary.span: 有关 对象的组件和用法，请参阅 XDocument Class Overview。

span.span: For the components and usage of an object, see XDocument Class Overview.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关有效的内容的详细信息，请参阅[有效内容的 XElement 和 XDocument 对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content of an , see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个文档，以及然后向其添加注释和一个元素。The following example creates a document, and then adds a comment and an element to it. 它然后组合使用查询的结果的另一个文档。It then composes another document using the results of a query. ```csharp XDocument srcTree = new XDocument( new XComment("This is a comment"), new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", "data1"), new XElement("Child2", "data2"), new XElement("Child3", "data3"), new XElement("Child2", "data4"), new XElement("Info5", "info5"), new XElement("Info6", "info6"), new XElement("Info7", "info7"), new XElement("Info8", "info8") ) ); XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XComment("This is a comment"), new XElement("Root", from el in srcTree.Element("Root").Elements() where ((string)el).StartsWith("data") select el ) ); Console.WriteLine(doc); ``` ```vb Dim srcTree As XDocument = _ data1 data2 data3 data4 info5 info6 info7 info8 Dim doc As XDocument = _ <%= From el In srcTree..Elements _ Where CStr(el).StartsWith("data") _ Select el %> Console.WriteLine(doc) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml data1 data2 data3 data4 ```

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重载的构造函数可用于创建新的空; 若要创建具有一些指定的初始内容; 以及创建作为另一个副本对象。Overloaded constructors enable you to create a new empty ; to create an with some specified initial content; and to create an as a copy of another object. 需要您创建 的情况不是很多。There are not many scenarios that require you to create an . 而是通常使用 根节点创建 XML 树。Instead, you can usually create your XML trees with an root node. 除非对创建文档有特定要求（例如，因为必须在顶级创建处理指令和注释，或者必须支持文档类型），否则使用 作为根节点通常更为方便。Unless you have a specific requirement to create a document (for example, because you have to create processing instructions and comments at the top level, or you have to support document types), it is often more convenient to use as your root node. 有关有效的内容的详细信息，请参阅[有效内容的 XElement 和 XDocument 对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content of an , see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个文档，以及然后向其添加注释和一个元素。The following example creates a document, and then adds a comment and an element to it. 它然后组合使用查询的结果的另一个文档。It then composes another document using the results of a query. ```csharp XDocument srcTree = new XDocument( new XComment("This is a comment"), new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", "data1"), new XElement("Child2", "data2"), new XElement("Child3", "data3"), new XElement("Child2", "data4"), new XElement("Info5", "info5"), new XElement("Info6", "info6"), new XElement("Info7", "info7"), new XElement("Info8", "info8") ) ); XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XComment("This is a comment"), new XElement("Root", from el in srcTree.Element("Root").Elements() where ((string)el).StartsWith("data") select el ) ); Console.WriteLine(doc); ``` ```vb Dim srcTree As XDocument = _ data1 data2 data3 data4 info5 info6 info7 info8 Dim doc As XDocument = _ <%= From el In srcTree..Elements _ Where CStr(el).StartsWith("data") _ Select el %> Console.WriteLine(doc) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml data1 data2 data3 data4 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 需要您创建 的情况不是很多。There are not many scenarios that require you to create an . 而是通常使用 根节点创建 XML 树。Instead, you can usually create your XML trees with an root node. 除非对创建文档有特定要求（例如，因为必须在顶级创建处理指令和注释，或者必须支持文档类型），否则使用 作为根节点通常更为方便。Unless you have a specific requirement to create a document (for example, because you have to create processing instructions and comments at the top level, or you have to support document types), it is often more convenient to use as your root node. 有关有效的内容的详细信息，请参阅[有效内容的 XElement 和 XDocument 对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content of an , see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个新文档，然后向其添加注释和一个元素。The following example creates a new document, and then adds a comment and an element to it. ```csharp XDocument doc = new XDocument(); doc.Add(new XComment("This is a comment")); doc.Add(new XElement("Root", "content")); Console.WriteLine(doc); ``` ```vb Dim doc As XDocument = New XDocument() doc.Add() doc.Add(content) Console.WriteLine(doc) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml content ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 需要您创建 的情况不是很多。There are not many scenarios that require you to create an . 而是通常使用 根节点创建 XML 树。Instead, you can usually create your XML trees with an root node. 除非对创建文档有特定要求（例如，因为必须在顶级创建处理指令和注释，或者必须支持文档类型），否则使用 作为根节点通常更为方便。Unless you have a specific requirement to create a document (for example, because you have to create processing instructions and comments at the top level, or you have to support document types), it is often more convenient to use as your root node. 有关有效的内容的详细信息，请参阅[有效内容的 XElement 和 XDocument 对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content of an , see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). ## Examples 以下示例使用此构造函数创建一个文档。The following example uses this constructor to create a document. ```csharp XDocument srcTree = new XDocument( new XComment("This is a comment"), new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", "data1"), new XElement("Child2", "data2"), new XElement("Child3", "data3"), new XElement("Child2", "data4"), new XElement("Info5", "info5"), new XElement("Info6", "info6"), new XElement("Info7", "info7"), new XElement("Info8", "info8") ) ); XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "yes"), new XComment("This is a new comment"), new XElement("Root", from el in srcTree.Element("Root").Elements() where ((string)el).StartsWith("data") select el ) ); doc.Save("Test.xml"); Console.WriteLine(File.ReadAllText("Test.xml")); ``` ```vb Dim srcTree As XDocument = _ data1 data2 data3 data4 info5 info6 info7 info8 Dim doc As XDocument = _ <%= From el In srcTree..Elements _ Where CStr(el).StartsWith("data") _ Select el %> doc.Save("Test.xml") Console.WriteLine(File.ReadAllText("Test.xml")) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml data1 data2 data3 data4 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有时，您必须创建一个文档的 XML 声明。Sometimes you have to create an XML declaration for a document. 如果你想要指示文档是独立，必须使用此属性。If you want to indicate that a document is standalone, you must use this property. 如果你想要使用的编码而非 utf-8 进行编码文档，则可以指定的编码通过。If you want to encode your document with an encoding other than utf-8, you can specify an encoding through the . 编码文档的另一种方法是指定的编码上您传递给 LINQ to XML 进行写入。Another approach for encoding a document is to specify the encoding on an that you pass to LINQ to XML for writing. ## Examples 以下示例使用此属性来检索文档的 XML 声明。The following example uses this property to retrieve the XML declaration of a document. ```csharp XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "yes"), new XComment("This is a comment"), new XElement("Root", "content") ); Console.WriteLine(doc.Declaration); ``` ```vb Dim doc As XDocument = _ content Console.WriteLine(doc.Declaration) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` ```

summary.span: 获取此文档的文档类型定义 (DTD)。

span.span: Gets the Document Type Definition (DTD) for this document.

value.span: 一个包含此文档 DTD 的 。

span.span: A that contains the DTD for this document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] 提供的对于 Dtd 的有限的支持。 provides limited support for DTDs. 您可以填充 XML 树与包含 DTD 的 XML 文档。You can populate an XML tree with an XML document that contains a DTD. XML 树将包含节点。The XML tree will then contain a node. 序列化或保存树时，还将序列 DTD。When you serialize or save the tree, the DTD will also be serialized. [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] 将扩展在 DTD 中的任何实体。 will expand any entities in the DTD. 序列化或保存 XML 树时，不会保存实体引用;相反，使用的实体引用的实体的文本替换为保存节点。When you serialize or save the XML tree, the entity references are not saved; instead, the nodes are saved with the entity references replaced by the text of the entity. 如果 DTD 包含默认属性，将在 XML 树中作为普通属性创建属性。If the DTD contains default attributes, the attributes are created in the XML tree as ordinary attributes. 默认情况下，[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]不会验证基于其 DTD 的文档。By default, [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] does not validate a document based on its DTD. 若要验证基于 DTD 的文档，创建，将验证基于 DTD，，然后创建 XML 树从。To validate a document based on a DTD, create an that will validate based on a DTD, and then create an XML tree from the . ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个包含文档。The following example creates a document that contains an . Visual Basic 不支持在 XML 文本中的文档类型。Visual Basic does not support document types within XML literals. 但是，就可以创建包含文档类型的第一次创建使用 XML 文本的文档，然后创建并添加一个文档中 XML 树中的适当位置的节点。However, it is possible to create a document that contains a document type by first creating the document using XML literals, and then creating and adding an node in the appropriate place in the XML tree. ```csharp string internalSubset = @" "; string target = "xml-stylesheet"; string data = "href='mystyle.css' title='Compact' type='text/css'"; XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XComment("This is a comment."), new XProcessingInstruction(target, data), new XDocumentType("Pubs", null, null, internalSubset), new XElement("Pubs", new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Artifacts of Roman Civilization"), new XElement("Author", "Moreno, Jordao") ), new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Midieval Tools and Implements"), new XElement("Author", "Gazit, Inbar") ) ), new XComment("This is another comment.") ); doc.Declaration = new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "true"); Console.WriteLine(doc); doc.Save("test.xml"); ``` ```vb Dim internalSubset = _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" Dim doc As XDocument = _ Artifacts of Roman Civilization Moreno, Jordao Midieval Tools and Implements Gazit, Inbar doc.Nodes().Skip(1).First().AddAfterSelf(New XDocumentType("Pubs", Nothing, Nothing, internalSubset)) Console.WriteLine(doc) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml ]> Artifacts of Roman Civilization Moreno, Jordao Midieval Tools and Implements Gazit, Inbar ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你想要控制负载选项，使用重载采用作为参数。If you want to control load options, use the overload that takes as a parameter. 加载功能的 LINQ to XML 基于。The loading functionality of LINQ to XML is built upon . 因此，您可能会捕获引发的任何异常重载的方法和方法来读取和分析该文档。Therefore, you might catch any exceptions that are thrown by the overload methods and the methods that read and parse the document. 如果您需要修改，请执行以下步骤：If you have to modify , follow these steps: 1. 创建通过调用之一重载采用作为参数。Create an by calling one of the overloads that take as a parameter. 2. 传递之一的重载采用作为参数。Pass the to one of the overloads of that takes as a parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks LINQ to XML 的加载功能基于。LINQ to XML's loading functionality is built upon . 因此，您可能会捕获引发的任何异常重载的方法和方法来读取和分析该文档。Therefore, you might catch any exceptions that are thrown by the overload methods and the methods that read and parse the document. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个文档从。The following example creates a document from a . ```csharp TextReader tr = new StringReader("Content"); XDocument doc = XDocument.Load(tr); Console.WriteLine(doc); ``` ```vb Dim tr As TextReader = New StringReader("Content") Dim doc As XDocument = XDocument.Load(tr) Console.WriteLine(doc) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml Content ```

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此方法使用基础若要将 XML 读入 XML 树。This method uses an underlying to read the XML into an XML tree. 使用若要创建从包含 XML 的字符串。Use to create an from a string that contains XML. LINQ to XML 的加载功能基于。LINQ to XML's loading functionality is built upon . 因此，您可能会捕获引发的任何异常重载的方法和方法来读取和分析该文档。Therefore, you might catch any exceptions that are thrown by the overload methods and the methods that read and parse the document. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何加载文件中。The following example shows how to load an from a file. 本示例使用下面的 XML 文档：This example uses the following XML document: [示例 XML 文件：典型采购订单 (LINQ to XML)Sample XML File: Typical Purchase Order (LINQ to XML)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0606c09f-6e43-4f8d-95c8-e8e2e08d2348) ```csharp XDocument doc = XDocument.Load("PurchaseOrder.xml"); Console.WriteLine(doc); ``` ```vb Dim doc As XDocument = XDocument.Load("PurchaseOrder.xml") Console.WriteLine(doc) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```
Ellen Adams 123 Maple Street Mill Valley CA 10999 USA
Tai Yee 8 Oak Avenue Old Town PA 95819 USA
Please leave packages in shed by driveway. Lawnmower 1 148.95 Confirm this is electric Baby Monitor 2 39.98 1999-05-21 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 加载功能的 LINQ to XML 基于。The loading functionality of LINQ to XML is built upon . 因此，您可能会捕获引发的任何异常重载的方法和方法来读取和分析该文档。Therefore, you might catch any exceptions that are thrown by the overload methods and the methods that read and parse the document. 如果您需要修改，请执行以下步骤：If you have to modify , follow these steps: 1. 创建通过调用之一采用重载作为参数。Create an by calling one of the overloads that takes as a parameter. 2. 传递之一的重载采用作为参数。Pass the to one of the overloads of that takes as a parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果源 XML 是缩进，则将设置标记中`options`导致读取器读取的源 XML 中的所有空白区域。If the source XML is indented, setting the flag in `options` causes the reader to read all white space in the source XML. 类型的节点为重要并无意义的空白区域创建。Nodes of type are created for both significant and insignificant white space. 如果源 XML 是缩进，则将不设置标记中`options`导致读取器忽略所有源 XML 中无意义的空白。If the source XML is indented, not setting the flag in `options` causes the reader to ignore all of the insignificant white space in the source XML. 不包括无关紧要的空白区域任何文本节点创建 XML 树。The XML tree is created without any text nodes for insignificant white space. 如果源 XML 不缩进，则将设置标记中`options`不起作用。If the source XML is not indented, setting the flag in `options` has no effect. 仍保留有效空白，并有可能导致创建多个空白文本节点的无用空格没有范围。Significant white space is still preserved, and there are no spans of insignificant white space that could cause the creation of more white space text nodes. 有关详细信息，请参阅[加载或分析 XML 时保留空白](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d)并[保留空白区域序列化时](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939)。For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939). 使用若要创建从包含 XML 的字符串。Use to create an from a string that contains XML. 设置无效，无法从加载时。Setting is not valid when loading from a . 如果您设置，则对性能产生负面影响标志。There is a performance penalty if you set the flag. XML 文档加载后的行信息是准确的。The line information is accurate immediately after loading the XML document. 如果在加载文档之后修改 XML 树，行信息可能会变得毫无意义。If you modify the XML tree after loading the document, the line information may become meaningless. LINQ to XML 的加载功能基于。LINQ to XML's loading functionality is built upon . 因此，您可能会捕获引发的任何异常重载的方法和方法来读取和分析该文档。Therefore, you might catch any exceptions that are thrown by the overload methods and the methods that read and parse the document. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个文档从。The following example creates a document from a . ```csharp TextReader sr; int whiteSpaceNodes; sr = new StringReader(" "); XDocument xmlTree1 = XDocument.Load(sr, LoadOptions.None); sr.Close(); whiteSpaceNodes = xmlTree1 .Element("Root") .DescendantNodesAndSelf() .OfType() .Where(tNode => tNode.ToString().Trim().Length == 0) .Count(); Console.WriteLine("Count of white space nodes (not preserving whitespace): {0}", whiteSpaceNodes); sr = new StringReader(" "); XDocument xmlTree2 = XDocument.Load(sr, LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace); sr.Close(); whiteSpaceNodes = xmlTree2 .Element("Root") .DescendantNodesAndSelf() .OfType() .Where(tNode => tNode.ToString().Trim().Length == 0) .Count(); Console.WriteLine("Count of white space nodes (preserving whitespace): {0}", whiteSpaceNodes); ``` ```vb Dim sr As TextReader Dim whiteSpaceNodes As Integer sr = New StringReader(" ") Dim xmlTree1 As XDocument = XDocument.Load(sr, LoadOptions.None) sr.Close() whiteSpaceNodes = xmlTree1 _ .Element("Root") _ .DescendantNodesAndSelf() _ .OfType(Of XText)() _ .Where(Function(ByVal tNode As XNode) tNode. _ ToString().Trim().Length = 0).Count() Console.WriteLine("Count of white space nodes (not preserving whitespace): {0}", whiteSpaceNodes) sr = New StringReader(" ") Dim xmlTree2 As XDocument = XDocument.Load(sr, LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace) sr.Close() whiteSpaceNodes = xmlTree2 _ .Element("Root") _ .DescendantNodesAndSelf() _ .OfType(Of XText)() _ .Where(Function(ByVal tNode As XNode) tNode. _ ToString().Trim().Length = 0).Count() Console.WriteLine("Count of white space nodes (preserving whitespace): {0}", whiteSpaceNodes) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Count of white space nodes (not preserving whitespace): 0 Count of white space nodes (preserving whitespace): 3 ```

LINQ to XML 的加载功能基于。LINQ to XML's loading functionality is built upon . 因此，您可能会捕获引发的任何异常重载的方法和方法来读取和分析该文档。Therefore, you might catch any exceptions that are thrown by the overload methods and the methods that read and parse the document. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何加载文件中。The following example shows how to load an from a file. 本示例使用下面的 XML 文档：This example uses the following XML document: [示例 XML 文件：典型采购订单 (LINQ to XML)Sample XML File: Typical Purchase Order (LINQ to XML)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0606c09f-6e43-4f8d-95c8-e8e2e08d2348) ```csharp XDocument doc1 = XDocument.Load("PurchaseOrder.xml", LoadOptions.None); Console.WriteLine("nodes if not preserving whitespace: {0}", doc1.DescendantNodes().Count()); XDocument doc2 = XDocument.Load("PurchaseOrder.xml", LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace); Console.WriteLine("nodes if preserving whitespace: {0}", doc2.DescendantNodes().Count()); ``` ```vb Dim doc1 As XDocument = XDocument.Load("PurchaseOrder.xml", LoadOptions.None) Console.WriteLine("nodes if not preserving whitespace: {0}", doc1.DescendantNodes().Count()) Dim doc2 As XDocument = XDocument.Load("PurchaseOrder.xml", LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace) Console.WriteLine("nodes if preserving whitespace: {0}", doc2.DescendantNodes().Count()) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` nodes if not preserving whitespace: 48 nodes if preserving whitespace: 82 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过创建从 DOM 文档，然后使用若要创建，可以使用此方法在 LINQ to XML 树中创建 DOM 文档的副本。By creating an from a DOM document, and then using the to create an , this method can be used to create a copy of a DOM document in a LINQ to XML tree. 使用若要创建从包含 XML 的字符串。Use to create an from a string that contains XML. 设置无效，无法从加载时。Setting is not valid when loading from a . 或未将配置任一读取空格。The will be configured to either read whitespace or not. LINQ to XML 树将填充的空白节点的读取器图面。The LINQ to XML tree will be populated with the whitespace nodes that the reader surfaces. 这将是无论行为或不设置。This will be the behavior regardless of whether is set or not. 可能有也可能没有有效的基 URI。The may have a valid base URI or not. 如果您设置，基 URI 在 XML 树中设置从报告的基 URI 。If you set , the base URI will be set in the XML tree from the base URI that is reported by the . 可能有也可能没有有效的行信息。The may have a valid line information or not. 如果您设置，行信息将会在 XML 树中的报告的行信息。If you set , the line information will be set in the XML tree from the line information that is reported by the . 如果您设置，则对性能产生负面影响标志。There is a performance penalty if you set the flag. XML 文档加载后的行信息是准确的。The line information is accurate immediately after loading the XML document. 如果在加载文档之后修改 XML 树，行信息可能会变得毫无意义。If you modify the XML tree after loading the document, the line information may become meaningless. LINQ to XML 的加载功能基于。LINQ to XML's loading functionality is built upon . 因此，您可能会捕获引发的任何异常重载的方法和方法来读取和分析该文档。Therefore, you might catch any exceptions that are thrown by the overload methods and the methods that read and parse the document. ## Examples 下面的示例加载它从加载的行信息。The following example loads the line information that it loads from the . 然后，它将打印的行信息。It then prints the line information. ```csharp string markup = @" "; // Create a reader and move to the content. using (XmlReader nodeReader = XmlReader.Create(new StringReader(markup))) { // the reader must be in the Interactive state in order to // Create a LINQ to XML tree from it. nodeReader.MoveToContent(); XDocument xRoot = XDocument.Load(nodeReader, LoadOptions.SetLineInfo); Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", "Element Name".PadRight(20), "Line".PadRight(5), "Position"); Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", "------------".PadRight(20), "----".PadRight(5), "--------"); foreach (XElement e in xRoot.Elements("Root").DescendantsAndSelf()) Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", ("".PadRight(e.Ancestors().Count() * 2) + e.Name).PadRight(20), ((IXmlLineInfo)e).LineNumber.ToString().PadRight(5), ((IXmlLineInfo)e).LinePosition); } ``` ```vb Dim markup As String = _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ " " & Environment.NewLine & _ " " & Environment.NewLine & _ " " & Environment.NewLine & _ "" ' Create a reader and move to the content. Using nodeReader As XmlReader = XmlReader.Create(New StringReader(markup)) ' The reader must be in the Interactive state in order to ' create a LINQ to XML tree from it. nodeReader.MoveToContent() Dim xRoot As XDocument = XDocument.Load(nodeReader, LoadOptions.SetLineInfo) Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", _ "Element Name".PadRight(20), _ "Line".PadRight(5), _ "Position") Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", _ "------------".PadRight(20), _ "----".PadRight(5), _ "--------") For Each e As XElement In xRoot.Elements("Root").DescendantsAndSelf() Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", _ ("".PadRight(e.Ancestors().Count() * 2) & e.Name.ToString()).PadRight(20), _ (DirectCast(e, IXmlLineInfo)).LineNumber.ToString().PadRight(5), _ (DirectCast(e, IXmlLineInfo)).LinePosition) Next End Using ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Element Name Line Position ------------ ---- -------- Root 1 2 Child 2 6 GrandChild 3 10 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果源 XML 是缩进，则将设置标记中`options`导致读取器读取的源 XML 中的所有空白区域。If the source XML is indented, setting the flag in `options` causes the reader to read all white space in the source XML. 类型的节点为重要并无意义的空白区域创建。Nodes of type are created for both significant and insignificant white space. 如果源 XML 是缩进，则将不设置标记中`options`导致读取器忽略所有源 XML 中无意义的空白。If the source XML is indented, not setting the flag in `options` causes the reader to ignore all of the insignificant white space in the source XML. 不包括无关紧要的空白区域任何文本节点创建 XML 树。The XML tree is created without any text nodes for insignificant white space. 如果源 XML 不缩进，则将设置标记中`options`不起作用。If the source XML is not indented, setting the flag in `options` has no effect. 仍保留有效空白，并有可能导致创建多个空白文本节点的无用空格没有范围。Significant white space is still preserved, and there are no spans of insignificant white space that could cause the creation of more white space text nodes. 有关详细信息，请参阅[加载或分析 XML 时保留空白](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d)并[保留空白区域序列化时](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939)。For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939). 设置从其进行分析时是无效的。Setting is not valid when parsing from a . 如果您设置，则对性能产生负面影响标志。There is a performance penalty if you set the flag. XML 文档加载后的行信息是准确的。The line information is accurate immediately after loading the XML document. 如果在加载文档之后修改 XML 树，行信息可能会变得毫无意义。If you modify the XML tree after loading the document, the line information may become meaningless. LINQ to XML 的加载功能基于。LINQ to XML's loading functionality is built upon . 因此，您可能会捕获引发的任何异常重载的方法和方法来读取和分析该文档。Therefore, you might catch any exceptions that are thrown by the overload methods and the methods that read and parse the document. ## Examples 下面的示例将字符串分析成。The following example parses a string into an . ```csharp string str = @" Content "; XDocument doc1 = XDocument.Parse(str, LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace); Console.WriteLine("nodes when preserving whitespace: {0}", doc1.DescendantNodes().Count()); XDocument doc2 = XDocument.Parse(str, LoadOptions.None); Console.WriteLine("nodes when not preserving whitespace: {0}", doc2.DescendantNodes().Count()); ``` ```vb Dim str As String = _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ " Content" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" Dim doc1 As XDocument = XDocument.Parse(str, LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace) Console.WriteLine("nodes when preserving whitespace: {0}", doc1.DescendantNodes().Count()) Dim doc2 As XDocument = XDocument.Parse(str, LoadOptions.None) Console.WriteLine("nodes when not preserving whitespace: {0}", doc2.DescendantNodes().Count()) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` nodes when preserving whitespace: 8 nodes when not preserving whitespace: 4 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你想要撰写时，此属性很有用[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]与在其编写为树的根相同的上下文中的查询。This property is useful when you want to compose [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] queries in the same context as when composing them for a tree rooted in . 请参阅[查询 XDocument 与。查询 XElement](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d266f58d-f2f3-4668-b661-e716e658d13a)的更多详细信息。See [Querying an XDocument vs. Querying an XElement](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d266f58d-f2f3-4668-b661-e716e658d13a) for more details. ## Examples 以下示例使用此属性以获取文档的根元素。The following example uses this property to get the root element of a document. ```csharp XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XComment("This is a comment."), new XElement("Pubs", new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Artifacts of Roman Civilization"), new XElement("Author", "Moreno, Jordao") ), new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Midieval Tools and Implements"), new XElement("Author", "Gazit, Inbar") ) ), new XComment("This is another comment.") ); Console.WriteLine(doc.Root.Name.ToString()); ``` ```vb Dim doc As XDocument = _ Artifacts of Roman Civilization Moreno, Jordao Midieval Tools and Implements Gazit, Inbar Console.WriteLine(doc.Root.Name.ToString()) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Pubs ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列化的 XML 会缩进。The serialized XML will be indented. 将删除所有无用空格，而且将添加的额外空白区域，以便正确缩进 XML。All insignificant white space will be removed, and additional white space will be added so that the XML will be properly indented. 此方法的行为是将不保留无关紧要的空白。The behavior of this method is that insignificant white space will not be preserved. 如果你想要控制空白区域，使用的重载采用作为参数。If you want to control white space, use the overload of that takes as a parameter. 使用保存未缩进的 XML 选项。Use the option to save unindented XML. 这会导致要完全按 XML 树中表示形式写入所有空白字符的编写器。This will cause the writer to write all white spaces exactly as represented in the XML tree. 使用选项如果想要删除重复的命名空间声明。Use option if you want to remove duplicate namespace declarations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列化的 XML 会缩进。The serialized XML will be indented. 将删除所有无用空格，而且将添加的额外空白区域，以便正确缩进 XML。All insignificant white space will be removed, and additional white space will be added so that the XML will be properly indented. 此方法的行为是将不保留无关紧要的空白。The behavior of this method is that insignificant white space will not be preserved. 如果你想要控制空白区域，使用的重载采用作为参数。If you want to control white space, use the overload of that takes as a parameter. 有关详细信息，请参阅[加载或分析 XML 时保留空白](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d)并[保留空白区域序列化时](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939)。For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939). ## Examples 下面的示例创建，将保存到的文档，然后将打印到控制台的字符串。The following example creates an , saves the document to a , and then prints the string to the console. ```csharp StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(); XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child", "content") ) ); TextWriter tr = new StringWriter(sb); doc.Save(tr); Console.WriteLine(sb.ToString()); ``` ```vb Dim sb As StringBuilder = New StringBuilder() Dim doc As XDocument = _ content Dim tr As TextWriter = New StringWriter(sb) doc.Save(tr) Console.WriteLine(sb.ToString()) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml content ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列化的 XML 会缩进。The serialized XML will be indented. 将删除所有无用空格，而且将添加的额外空白区域，以便正确缩进 XML。All insignificant white space will be removed, and additional white space will be added so that the XML will be properly indented. 此方法的行为是将不保留无关紧要的空白。The behavior of this method is that insignificant white space will not be preserved. 如果你想要控制空白区域，使用的重载采用作为参数。If you want to control white space, use the overload of that takes as a parameter. 有关详细信息，请参阅[加载或分析 XML 时保留空白](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d)并[保留空白区域序列化时](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939)。For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939). ## Examples 下面的示例创建将文档保存到一个文件，然后将打印到控制台文件。The following example creates an , saves the document to a file, and then prints the file to the console. ```csharp XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child", "content") ) ); doc.Save("Root.xml"); Console.WriteLine(File.ReadAllText("Root.xml")); ``` ```vb Dim doc As XDocument = _ content doc.Save("Root.xml") Console.WriteLine(File.ReadAllText("Root.xml")) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml content ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下`options`设置为。By default the `options` are set to . 此选项将删除所有多余的无意义空白，并添加相应的无意义空白，以便的 XML 格式不正确缩进。This option will remove all extraneous insignificant white space, and add appropriate insignificant white space so that the XML is properly indented. 如果你想要保存未缩进的 XML，指定标记为可`options`。If you want to save unindented XML, specify the flag for `options`. 这会导致要完全按 XML 树中表示形式写入所有空白字符的编写器。This will cause the writer to write all white spaces exactly as represented in the XML tree. 使用选项如果想要删除重复的命名空间声明。Use option if you want to remove duplicate namespace declarations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你想要保存未缩进的 XML，指定标记为可`options`。If you want to save unindented XML, specify the flag for `options`. 这会导致要完全按 XML 树中表示形式写入的所有空白的编写器。This will cause the writer to write all white space exactly as represented in the XML tree. 如果你想要保存缩进的 XML，不要指定标记为可`options`。If you want to save indented XML, do not specify the flag for `options`. 这将删除所有多余的无意义空白，并添加相应的无意义空白，以便的 XML 格式不正确缩进。This will remove all extraneous insignificant white space, and add appropriate insignificant white space so that the XML is properly indented. 这是默认行为和行为的重载方法不采用`options`作为参数。This is the default behavior, and the behavior of the overloads of the methods that do not take `options` as a parameter. 有关详细信息，请参阅[加载或分析 XML 时保留空白](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d)并[保留空白区域序列化时](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939)。For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939). ## Examples 下面的示例演示此方法的两种用法。The following example shows two uses of this method. 第一次使用序列化使用格式设置。The first use serializes the with formatting. 第二个保留空白。The second preserves white space. 由于构造，该文档中不包含任何空格，保留空白时将 XML 输出而无需任何缩进。Because the document has no white space in it as constructed, preserving white space outputs the XML without any indenting. ```csharp XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child", "content") ) ); StringBuilder sb1 = new StringBuilder(); using (StringWriter sr1 = new StringWriter(sb1)) { doc.Save(sr1, SaveOptions.None); Console.WriteLine(sb1.ToString()); } StringBuilder sb2 = new StringBuilder(); using (StringWriter sr2 = new StringWriter(sb2)) { doc.Save(sr2, SaveOptions.DisableFormatting); Console.WriteLine(sb2.ToString()); } ``` ```vb Dim doc As XDocument = _ content Dim sb1 As StringBuilder = New StringBuilder() Using sr1 = New StringWriter(sb1) doc.Save(sr1, SaveOptions.None) Console.WriteLine(sb1.ToString()) End Using Dim sb2 As StringBuilder = New StringBuilder() Using sr2 = New StringWriter(sb2) doc.Save(sr2, SaveOptions.DisableFormatting) Console.WriteLine(sb2.ToString()) End Using ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` content content ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你想要保存未缩进的 XML，指定标记为可`options`。If you want to save unindented XML, specify the flag for `options`. 这会导致要完全按 XML 树中表示形式写入的所有空白的编写器。This will cause the writer to write all white space exactly as represented in the XML tree. 如果你想要保存缩进的 XML，不要指定标记为可`options`。If you want to save indented XML, do not specify the flag for `options`. 这将删除所有多余的无意义空白，并添加相应的无意义空白，以便的 XML 格式不正确缩进。This will remove all extraneous insignificant white space, and add appropriate insignificant white space so that the XML is properly indented. 这是默认行为和行为的重载方法不采用`options`作为参数。This is the default behavior, and the behavior of the overloads of the methods that do not take `options` as a parameter. 有关详细信息，请参阅[加载或分析 XML 时保留空白](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d)并[保留空白区域序列化时](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939)。For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939). ## Examples 下面的示例演示此方法的两种用法。The following example shows two uses of this method. 第一次使用保留空白。The first use preserves white space. 第二个序列化带缩进。The second one serializes the with indenting. ```csharp XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child", "content") ) ); doc.Save("Root1.xml", SaveOptions.DisableFormatting); Console.WriteLine(File.ReadAllText("Root1.xml")); doc.Save("Root2.xml", SaveOptions.None); Console.WriteLine(File.ReadAllText("Root2.xml")); ``` ```vb Dim doc As XDocument = _ content doc.Save("Root1.xml", SaveOptions.DisableFormatting) Console.WriteLine(File.ReadAllText("Root1.xml")) doc.Save("Root2.xml", SaveOptions.None) Console.WriteLine(File.ReadAllText("Root2.xml")) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` content content ```
